properties.name: Pandemonium Books & Games
properties.description: Posted by Achudnow4 Pleasant Street, cambridge, MAPandemonium stocks sci-fi, fantasy, and horror books, as well as magazines, board games, roleplaying games, collectible card games, graphic novels, and miniatures. We also carry a wide variety of good used books, manga, and minis.

properties.name: Planet Books
properties.description: Posted by Achudnow3917 E Anaheim St, Long Beach, CAA wonderful, old fashioned, disorganized clutter of a bookstore. The proprietor is friendly and helpful and loves to discuss books. They have a large selection of used SF paperback and a fair selection of hardbacks along with some comics, magazines and books from other genres. A great place to spend some time rummaging around. (562) 985-3154

properties.name: Rainy Day Paperback
properties.description: Posted by Achudnow81 Greenwood Avenue, Bethel, CTInexpensive, used, reading copies and better of SciFi, Horror and Fantasy. Separate section of vintage from 50s, 60s & 70s. Paperback and Hardbound, all alphabetized by author. Open Tues-Thurs 12-6; Fri 11-7; Sat 10-6. Store inventory on-line at www.rainydaypaperback.com or call at (203)743-6938 for availability. Trade in your used books for store credit.
